Description:
Prime Location Close To Everything!
The Feel:
Waste no time moving in and living life! This beautifully presented 3-bedroom home is located in an established street in a popular area, steps from parkland & only 600m walk to Curlewis Shopping Village. A low-maintenance backyard & well-designed floorplan with a spacious kitchen & living zone will suit families or downsizers, appealing to those looking to call Brompton Avenue home, or as a portfolio addition.
The Facts:
-Neat brick veneer family home with outlook to community parkland
-Pleasant first impression of neat well-kept lawn & covered portico entrance with timber deck
-Open plan layout with sunny north & west outlooks from kitchen, living & meals area
-Sliding doors to both aspects reveal large wraparound timber decks & lawn for outdoor living
-Light, bright home with timber laminate floors to high traffic areas + carpet to all bedrooms
-Galley style kitchen with caesarstone island bench, ample storage & floor to ceiling pantry
-Quality s/s appliances; 900mm electric Smeg oven, 6 burner gas cooktop, Asko dishwasher
-Impressive Master with double vanity en suite, walk-in robe
-2 more zoned bedrooms with BIRs & adjacent hallway storage
-Large family bathroom with deep bath & shower, shower & separate toilet
-Ducted heating & evaporative cooling throughout
-Double glazed windows throughout & seasonal passive design for heating/cooling
-Exposed aggregate concrete driveway to RC DLUG, with internal & rear door access
-Fantastic location close to shops, facilities, Reserve & within the ever-popular school precinct
The Owner Loves
We love the central location and easy access to everything we need, with walking trails to Woolworths (600m), Aldi & Coles (2km) and the beach and Reserves all nearby.

Description:
Bring the Kids, their Toys and the Dog too!
What an opportunity! Boasting an incredible 850m2 block - the largest on the market in Curlewis and one of the biggest blocks available in the estate, this is a blink and you'll miss it opportunity!
The home is setback from the street and offers a wide frontage, DLUG with rear access to the backyard and a multitude of space for off street parking for multiple cars, boats, trailers, caravans and everything in between - a true rarity in Curlewis!
The home itself is spacious and cleverly zoned fit for the growing family. The fore comprises a central hallway with 3 light-filled bedrooms, all with built-in-robes, family bathroom with seamless shower, tiled in bath and stone benchtop vanity, separate toilet and laundry with outdoor access. A separate lounge room effortlessly flows into the spacious open plan galley style kitchen with 900ml gas cooking, dishwasher, stone benchtops and an impressive walk-in-pantry which all overlooks the dining and living area. The master retreat sits at the rear with his and her walk-in-robes, ensuite with double vanity, shower and toilet and complete with sliding door access to the back alfresco. A vast open grassed area allows for your imagination to run wild! Leave as is for hours of play or create your own tranquil haven with ample space for an inground pool or additional garaging.
Additional features include - Timber floating floors, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, low maintenance front and back gardens.
Any closer to the Curlewis Shopping precinct and you'd be in the car park! An incredibly convenient location on offer with the shops and public transport on your doorstep, while the boat ramp, Bay, Golf Clubs and everything else the Bellarine has to offer only moments away. There can only be one lucky buyer who secures the most convenient and biggest blocks in Curlewis - Don't miss this!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Premium Position & Parkland Views
The Feel:
One of the last remaining blocks in the Bayview Estate, this substantial corner allotment boasts a superbly central position opposite natural parklands, and walking tracks to school and beaches.
Build your dream home capturing a serene water vista from a second level (STCA), with sunrise over Gum trees to the east, and the convenience of Bayview Central a mere 600m stroll from home.
The Facts:
-567sqm approx. corner allotment at Bayview Estate Curlewis
-Stunning master planned community with parks and playgrounds
-Last remaining block in established neighbourhood
-Opposite natural creek and reserve with bushland aspect
-Potential for water views from a second level (STCA)
-Safe walking track and pedestrian bridge to Clifton Springs Primary
-600m to Bayview Central shopping centre

Titled and ready for your build!
Established block of land already titled and ready for someone to create their dream home on 420m2. Located in the popular Curlewis estate surrounded by pristine beaches and the regions finest wineries all within an easy commute to the CBD of Geelong. Tivoli Drive is currently under construction to provide direct access to the Bellarine highway making the commute even easier. If you are looking for something without the delays of waiting for the subdivision to be completed then don't delay your decision making.

Description:
Priced to Sell!
Here is your opportunity to purchase this lovely parcel of land in the Coriyule Estate Curlewis. It would make an excellent investment- either to build an investment property or hold for future growth. Or alternatively if you are looking for a lifestyle change then you can't go wrong to consider moving to the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula and in particular the fast growing suburb of Curlewis. Just minutes from the Clifton Springs boat ramp that sits on the edge of Port Phillip Bay. This corner allotment measures 374m2 and is titled so you could begin building as soon as settlement occurs. Also available are Lots 1018 (adjoining) and Lot 1015. Call or email today for more information.

Description:
A LEAFY FACADE OPENS TO A WEALTH OF LIVING.
A real surprise with so much space, fabulous taste and design . Separate lounge room , a wonderful open plan area which includes living, fabulous kitchen, large dining and even a study space, all this opens up to an undercover entertaining patio.......a lot of leisure time is spent here . Another room can be used for third living/library/theatre or fifth bedroom. The master bedroom is generous with WIR and ensuite, other three queen bedrooms have BIR'S. Central bathroom, laundry and toilet. Features include central heating , evaporative cooling, stone benches, dishwasher, walk in pantry, triple stacker doors, some double glazing, 900m stove, solar gas booster hotwater, stunning light fittings and more to impress. Double garage and garden shed. Such a well designed home, nothing to do but enjoy stylish living, leafy haven and privacy yet only a short walk to the bay and all amenities.

Description:
Only minutes to the beach
Beautifully finished to the highest standard with a design that delivers low maintenance family living at its best, this stylish home is within walking distance to the beach and shops.
Offering four bedrooms and three living spaces, this well-designed Curlewis property is an ideal investment, great for a family, downsizers and those looking to retreat from the city life.
The kitchen boasts a stone bench with waterfall edges, stainless steel appliances and walk-in pantry for ample storage. Featuring indoor/outdoor flow from the dining area is an undercover deck equipped for alfresco entertaining with a built-in barbeque, pizza oven, drinks fridge and beer tap.
The set-back corner position offers potential for storing a boat or caravan as well as 4.2kw solar panels with battery backup making this is an ideal home for low cost living. Inspect today.

Description:
Open plan family home, with private backyard.
To book an inspection outside of the advertised times please contact our office on 5250 4777
On offer here, in ever-popular Curlewis, is this 8-year-old home which was built as a display home by Cavalier Homes and includes many extra touches as a result.
Comprising 3 spacious bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a second living area or potential 4th bedroom, and a private back yard for the kids to run around, this property is sure to tick the boxes for a vast array of savvy buyers.
The light-filled and open plan kitchen, living, and dining area offers plenty of space for the whole family and opens out to the sunny west-facing alfresco, perfect for afternoon entertaining. A second living room adjoins the main living area and could be utilised as a 4th bedroom or home theatre.
Accommodation is well-appointed with a large master bedroom offering a walk-in robe and ensuite, and two further bedrooms to the rear of the home both offer built-in robes and are serviced by a central bathroom.
Outside you will find a large back yard with established native shrubs and a secure side area, perfect for those with dogs.
Notable features include:
- Ducted heating throughout.
- Split system A/C in the living area.
- Double garage with polished exposed aggregate floor and internal access.
Ideally located, this property is just a short walk to the Bellarine Rail Trail, and a short drive to local schools, supermarkets, cafes, as well as the lifestyle the Bellarine has to offer, with wineries, golf courses, and the Clifton springs jetty nearby. Enquire today before it's too late.

Description:
Family home with room for the van or boat!
HIGH on the wishlist of buyers we talk to is somewhere to store their toys - so you're going to love having side access and an additional garage for your van, boat, trailer - whatever it is you want to keep safe. Whether you're looking to upgrade the family home, or downsizing but still want plenty of room for the grandkids, your search ends now!
You'll love living here because you're close to everything. You can walk to the shops, drop the kids off to school in minutes, or if you're lucky enough to have some 'me time' - launch the boat off Clifton Springs or play the back 9 at Curlewis Golf Club.
The light-filled open-plan kitchen/dining/living extends perfectly onto the alfresco, and your kitchen is complete with all the luxuries you wish for including stone benchtops, walk-in pantry and quality stainless steel appliances. A separate lounge helps when there's a clash of TV shows, or keep it open so you can keep an eye on things. Whether your just hanging at home with the kids or entertaining, you'll enjoy having line of sight from the kitchen to the flat grassed backyard and alfresco.
The Master Bedroom with ensuite and walk-in robe is positioned cleverly away from the 3 kids' bedrooms that also have walk-in robes. They share a central bathroom, but the inclusion of a powder room with the separate toilet was a master stroke and ensures guests don't need to enter the kids' bathroom - winning!
This one is sure to be popular - call now to avoid disappointment.

Description:
Fantastic Bay-Side Location
Within walking distance to the Bay, Parks and recreational reserves this home is in an ideal location. Only a short drive to Portarlington, with shops, amenities and ferry access to Melbourne. Shopping precinct only minutes away, this property is sure to impress.
Open plan living based in neutral tones throughout.
Designer kitchen with lots of storage and stainless steel appliances.
Ducted heating with split system cooling.
Over-sized double remote garage.
This home comes with a large master bedroom with walk in robe and the ensuite is complete with toilet, a large shower and vanity unit.
The three other bedrooms are serviced by a well designed central bathroom incorporating a shower, vanity and a deep bath for relaxation.

READ, SET, BUILD
Ready for a sea change ? Well here is an exciting opportunity to build your dream home with this near level allotment of approx 420m2 perfectly located in the stunning Curlewis Parks Estate, where an enviable coastal living lifestyle awaits you. Within walking distance to shopping, schools, the well established township of Drysdale and only minutes to the spectacular foreshore, boat ramp and easy access to Geelong CBD, Portarlington ferry to Docklands, wineries, golf clubs and so much more that The Bellarine Peninsula has to offer.
Be quick to secure this beautiful parcel of land and make your dream a reality

Close to Primary School, walking tracks lead to the beach and playground. Talk to me to organize inspection.

Description:
Wake Up To Views
Two storey delightful Dennis Family home just 3 years young has all the space, comforts and views you desire. Lovely low maintenance landscaped gardens great you as you pull into the driveway with exposed aggregate, a double car garage plus a separate single car garage. Front double doors as you step inside to a grand hall with shining white floor tiles and a formal lounge to the right. Flowing on is a theatre room to the left with dual doors access doors. Next is a large open plan living zone that is light filled perfect for a big dining table & plush lounge that features lush garden views plus easy access to three sliding doors out to the deck. Stylish kitchen has 40mm stone benches, stainless steel appliances including a 900mm gas oven, 5 burner cook top, range hood, dish washer & a super walk in pantry with enough room for a second fridge. Also, off the living area is a study, a powder room, laundry adjacent to the clothes line & under stairs storage. Hardwood timber stairs take you up to the first floor & 4th living area which has sliding doors out to the balcony with divine bay views, you can see across to Melbourne CBD on the right, Geelong on the left & straight out to the Chanel in the centre where ships cruise in & out every day, not to mention the twinkling of lights at night time. Massive master has amazing bay views, gigantic walk in robe through to the en-suite with his & hers vanities with stone tops & a double sized shower with dual heads. But wait, there is even more bay views at bedrooms 2 & 3 that both have walk in robes. Bedroom 4 has pool views, walk in robe & direct access to the 2 way bathroom with a deep built in bath & separate shower. Also, here another powder room. Out the back is the L shaped Merbau alfresco deck, alongside retaining wall gardens, water features, garden shed, a bike shed, side gate & vegetable gardens. The pool is gas heated & salt chlorinated perfect to jump in & splash around after a hard day. Additional features are 2.6 meter ceilings, 3 mounted televisions which are staying, 2 are 65 inch & a 70 inch, evaporative cooling, gas ducted heating, double glazed windows, upstairs front & bedroom windows are tinted and 5kw solar panels. All on a 641m2 block in the very desirable suburb of Curlewis with all amenities close by.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Low Maintenance Luxe Living
Quality, design and concept all set upon a low maintenance parcel, this compact home offers a great alternative to townhouse and unit style living.
Tucked away in a private surrounding with all your amenities at your fingertips this home offers location, comfort and convenience. Proximity to the Bay, Boat Ramp, Clifton Springs Golf Club, transport and major amenities.
Comprising 2 well-appointed bedrooms, the main with a walk-in robe and access to the two-way bathroom. The 2nd bedroom is equipped with built-in robes and handy access to the separate toilet/powder room. A formal living area completes the fore of the home before flowing into the large open plan kitchen/meals and 2nd living. The designer kitchen will impress with stone benchtops, custom garden window, in-bench sink, soft closing drawers and stainless-steel appliances including dishwasher. The laundry is conveniently located off the kitchen and completes this astute floorplan.
The garden is lush and private, keep it low maintenance or create a masterpiece, the undercover area is a huge bonus along with the garden shed and aggregate concrete all around.
Compact living has never been so convenient not to mention the abundance of additional features and luxe finishes. Features of the home include screen doors, keyless front entry, quality window and floor furnishings with Spotted Gum floors, plantation shutters, ceiling fans throughout, stone benchtops, double glazed windows throughout, ducted heating, solar extraction roof unit, NBN ready, additional tv points, single lock up garage with remote entry.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property

Description:
Nothing To Do But Move In & Enjoy!!
This lovely 4 bedroom home has had a complete makeover.
With new carpet, laminate flooring, kitchen benchtop, downlight & pendant lighting throughout this 8 year old home is looking like new again.
Whether your adding to your portfolio or upsizing for your growing family this home ticks all the boxes.
The master bedroom situated at the front of the home includes ensuite, WIR and ceiling fan.
The property includes ducted heating, split system A/C, 2 spacious living areas, & remote garage with internal access to the home.
Low maintenance landscaped gardens, garden shed & paved alfresco area complete this lovely home.
Nothing to do here except 'Walk Right In Sit Right down'
With the new Curlewis Shopping Centre only a short stroll away and public transport, schools, the boat ramp and all other major amenities at your fingertips, this is the lifestyle change you have been waiting for! The Bellarine is booming with our world class wineries, eateries, beaches and the Portarlington Ferry just to name a few.
Call now to book your inspection as this property won't be on the market for long.

Description:
Room for everyone!
Super low maintenance property. Located just around the corner from Curlewis shopping centre and not far from the golf course, boat ramp and many other desirable features, this immaculate Simonds family home is built on a 635M2 double block, which comprises two off street parking access points, which is great for the tradies and visitors, double garage, ducted gas heating and Solar hot water with electric back up. The spacious master bedroom has a walk in robe and full en-suite.
The other 3 bedrooms are fitted with built in robes. With a lovely wide entrance leading to formal lounge and then on to the open plan fully appointed kitchen, family and meals. The main bathroom, Walk In Linen Press are central to this delightful residence. There are blockout double blinds throughout.
The fact that mum can watch the kids in the secure back yard and an under cover entertainment area add to the benefits of this lovely family home. Reasonable offers considered.

High ceilings, wide entrance, gas ducted heating, plus many extras unseen by the naked eye. The large master bedroom boasts his and hers walk in robes, a full en-suite and separately roomed W/C. There is a formal sitting room, a theatre room and then...the other 3 bedrooms have built in robes, split systems and it's own den. Out door living, pebble mix paving, security shutters, 20 Solar panels, quality window furnishings and so much more. This Porter Davis home has many hidden exras and will make you the envy of all who know you.
Come and see for yourself by making an appointment.

Description:
Quality Home, Quality Estate, Low Maintenance Living
Located within the highly desired Curlewis Parks community is this brand new four-bedroom home. Tastefully designed and expertly crafted, this spacious Metricon home is situated on the doorstep of some of the Bellarine Peninsula's best wineries, beaches and bays. This fantastic home delivers the greatest of low maintenance living to your feet without compromising on quality or family lifestyle.
Great sized open plan kitchen, living and dining area
Kitchen with stone benchtops, w/in pantry and SS appliances
Spacious master bedroom features w/in robe and ensuite
Three additional bedrooms with b/in robes and shared bathroom
Remote double lock-up garage features internal access
Ducted heating providing comfort throughout
Secure backyard features easy care gardens and side access
Landscaped parks and playgrounds a short walk away
20 minutes to Geelong CBD, Waterfront and Botanical Gardens
Internal area
211m²
Insights: 15 Isla Road, Curlewis VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020 and 40 other 4 bedroom house in Curlewis have recently been sold.
